abstract.text: A base protocol for all Configuration messages.

inlineContent.text: Configuration messages are used to configure Nodes. They are sent between
Configuration Client model on the Configuration Manager and Configuration Server
model on the device, which is being configured. All Config messages are encrypted

abstract.text: A base protocol for config messages related to Models.
Index of this Network Key, in range from 0 through to 4095.
A Remote Provisioning PDU Report message is an unacknowledged message used by
the Remote Provisioning Server to report the Provisioning PDU that either was
received from the device being provisioned or was generated locally during the
Device Key Refresh procedure, the Node Address Refresh procedure, or the
Node Composition Refresh procedure.
A base protocol for unacknowledged Remote Provisioning messages.
A Private Node Identity Set message is an acknowledged message used to set the
current Private Node Identity state for a subnet.
A
is an acknowledged message used to delete an
from the NetKey List on a Node.
A Remote Provisioning Link Status message is an unacknowledged message used by
the Remote Provisioning Server to acknowledge a Remote Provisioning Link Get
message, a Remote Provisioning Link Open message, or a Remote Provisioning
Link Close message.
A Remote Provisioning Link Report message is an unacknowledged message used by
the Remote Provisioning Server to report the state change of a provisioning
bearer link or the Node Provisioning Protocol Interface.
Application Keys are used to encrypt mesh messages on Access Layer.
A Remote Provisioning Scan Stop message is an acknowledged message that is used
by the Remote Provisioning Client to terminate the Remote Provisioning Scan procedure.
Provision, configure and control Bluetooth mesh devices with nRF Mesh library.
The Config Low Power Node PollTimeout Status is an unacknowledged message
used to report the current value of the PollTimeout timer of the Low Power
Node within a Friend Node.
A Private Beacon Set message is an acknowledged message used to set the
Private Beacon state and the Random Update Interval Steps state of a Node.
A Private Node Identity Get message is an acknowledged message used to get the
current Private Node Identity state for a subnet.
The Config Low Power Node PollTimeout Get is an acknowledged message
used to get the current value of PollTimeout timer of the Low Power
node within a Friend Node.
The message is sent to a Friend Node that has claimed to be handling
messages by sending ACKs On Behalf Of (OBO) the indicated Low Power
Node. This message should only be sent to a Node that has the Friend
feature supported and enabled.
A
is an unacknowledged message used to report the status of
the operation on the NetKey List.
A Private GATT Proxy Get message is an acknowledged message used to get the
current Private GATT Proxy state of a Node.
A
is an acknowledged message used to delete an
from the AppKey List on a Node.
A Remote Provisioning PDU Send message is an unacknowledged message used by
the Remote Provisioning Client to deliver the Provisioning PDU to an
unprovisioned device or to the Node Provisioning Protocol Interface.
A Remote Provisioning Scan Status message is an unacknowledged message used by
the Remote Provisioning Server to report the current value of the
Remote Provisioning Scan Parameters state and the Remote Provisioning Scan state
of a Remote Provisioning Server model.
A Remote Provisioning Link Get message is an acknowledged message used by the
Remote Provisioning Client to get the Remote Provisioning Link state of a
Remote Provisioning Server model.
A Private GATT Proxy Status message is an unacknowledged message used to report
the current Private GATT Proxy state of a Node.
A
message is an acknowledged message used to set the SAR Receiver state of a
Node.
The base class of every mesh message. Mesh messages can be sent to and
received from a mesh network.
A Private Node Identity Status message is an unacknowledged message used to
report the current Private Node Identity state for a subnet.
A Remote Provisioning Scan Start message is an acknowledged message that is
used by the Remote Provisioning Client to start the Remote Provisioning Scan
procedure, which finds unprovisioned devices within immediate radio range of
the Remote Provisioning Server.
Index of this Application Key, in range from 0 through to 4095.
A base protocol for unacknowledged Remote Provisioning messages.
A Remote Provisioning Link Get message is an acknowledged message used by the
Remote Provisioning Client to get the Remote Provisioning Link state of a
Remote Provisioning Server model.
A base protocol for config messages related to Network Key and Application Key.
A base protocol for acknowledged Configuration messages.

the current SAR Transmitter state of a Node.

Private GATT Proxy state of a Node.

is an acknowledged message used to add an
to the NetKey List on a Node.
A base protocol for acknowledged Remote Provisioning messages.
A base protocol for config messages related to Elements.
A base protocol for config messages related to Models, where the Model can be
a vendor model.

message is an acknowledged message used to set the SAR Transmitter
state of a Node.
A base protocol for config messages with list of Application Keys.
The status of a Config operation.
A Private Beacon Get message is an acknowledged message used to get the current
Private Beacon state and Random Update Interval Steps state of a Node.

A Private Beacon Status message is an unacknowledged message used to report
the current Private Beacon state and Random Update Interval Steps state of a Node.

A Remote Provisioning Scan Get message is an acknowledged message that is used
by the Remote Provisioning Client to get the various scanning states of a
Remote Provisioning Server model.
A base protocol for Remote Provisioning messages reporting link state.
A base protocol for all Configuration messages.
A Remote Provisioning Link Open message is an acknowledged message used by the
Remote Provisioning Client to establish the provisioning bearer between a node
supporting the Remote Provisioning Server model and an unprovisioned device,
or to open the Node Provisioning Protocol Interface.
A base protocol for config messages with Virtual Label property.
A Remote Provisioning PDU Outbound Report message is an unacknowledged message
used by the Remote Provisioning Server to report completion of the delivery
of the Provisioning PDUs that the Remote Provisioning Server either sends to
a device that is being provisioned or processes locally during the
Device Key Refresh procedure, the Node Address Refresh procedure,
or the Node Composition Refresh procedure.

on
a Node.
A Remote Provisioning Scan Capabilities Status message is an unacknowledged
message used by the Remote Provisioning Server to report the current value of
the Remote Provisioning Scan Capabilities state of a Remote Provisioning Server.
A base protocol for unacknowledged Configuration messages.
A type of a mesh message which opcode is known during compilation time.
A Remote Provisioning Extended Scan Report message is an unacknowledged message
used by the Remote Provisioning Server to report the advertising data requested
by the client in a Remote Provisioning Extended Scan Start message.
A
is an acknowledged message used to update an
value on the AppKey List on a Node.
A Remote Provisioning Scan Report message is an unacknowledged message used by
the Remote Provisioning Server to report the scanned Device UUID of an
unprovisioned device.

is an acknowledged message used to report all
s
known to the Node.

A base protocol for config messages with list of Model subscription addresses.
A
message is an acknowledged message used to get
the current SAR Transmitter state of a Node.
A base protocol for config messages related to Network Keys.
A base protocol for config messages with an Address property.
The Network Keys are used to encrypt mesh messages on the Network Layer.
The base class of every mesh message. Mesh messages can be sent to and
received from the mesh network. For messages with the Op Code known
during compilation a
protocol should be preferred.
A
message is an unacknowledged message used to report the current
SAR Receiver state of a Node.
A base protocol for config status messages.
A Remote Provisioning Scan Capabilities Get message is an acknowledged message
used by the Remote Provisioning Client to get the value of the Remote Provisioning
Scan Capabilities state.
A base protocol for config status messages.
A base protocol for all Remote Provisioning messages.
A base protocol for config messages related to vendor Models.
A
message is an acknowledged message used to get
the current SAR Receiver state of a Node.
A Remote Provisioning Extended Scan Start message is an unacknowledged message
that is used by the Remote Provisioning Client to request additional information
about a specific unprovisioned device or about the Remote Provisioning Server itself.

The base class for response messages.
A base protocol for config messages related to Application Keys.
